    Examples

    Examples

    examples.Rmd
    library(durbanplasticwaste)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(leaflet)

    Plot

    Descriptive text.

    
litterboom_counts |> 
  group_by(category, location) |> 
  summarise(count = sum(count)) |> 
  
  ggplot(aes(x = category,
             y = count,
             fill = category)) +
  geom_col() +
  facet_wrap(~location) +
  coord_flip() +
  theme_bw(base_size = 14) +
  theme(legend.position = "none",
        panel.grid = element_blank())

    Prepare a map 

    leaflet(locations)  |>
  setView(lng = locations$longitude[[4]],
          lat = locations$latitude[[4]],
          zoom = 13) |>
  addTiles() |>
  addCircleMarkers(
    lng = ~longitude,
    lat = ~latitude,
    label = ~location,
    radius = 10,
    stroke = FALSE,
    fillOpacity = 1,
    labelOptions = labelOptions(noHide = T,
                                textsize = "10px",
                                direction = "left",
                                offset = c(0, 0),
                                style = list(
                                  "box-shadow" = "3px 3px rgba(0,0,0,0.25)",
                                  "border-color" = "rgba(0,0,0,0.5)",
                                  "font-style" = "italic"
                                )))
